name: White YouTube - October 2011
description:
Fixes the ugly greyish background introduced in October 2011. It also replaces the new (ugly) YouTube favicon to the previous one.
You should also try Youtube Enhancer (http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/33042), as it's much better than the Cosmic Panda experiment.
additional_info:
Changelog:
02/12/11: Now 20 percent cooler, added the old YouTube favicon
08/11/11: First release
